casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Edward Lee MEDLEY. No. 348P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 12, 2004. Edward Lee Medley, Pro Se. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, Tom Horner, District Attorney, for State.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 6th day of July 2004 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the Superior Court, Wilkes County, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court of that County:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 12th day of August 2004."
